channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #en @ 1444878296949288961
item.description: (1/2) To move towards #ReopeningSafely, it is vital our surveillance & analysis becomes more granular & predictive - for instance zooming into adolescent cases as schools reopen. I asked CPRC and the COVIDNOW team to facilitate this on the site as part of our #OpenData pledge. https://t.co/qDLgT7AQUE

item.title: #en @ 1444869244982804480
item.description:
For some reason, buyers in New Zealand went crazy for Model 3 in Q3. Registrations were more than 4x of Q2.
Tesla Model 3 registrations in New Zealand: • 96 in Q4 2020 • 384 in Q1 2021 • 311 in Q2 2021 • 1,454 in Q3 2021
Source: https://t.co/pfJTL6G8xD https://t.co/adXOKgdGYh

La situación de cada entidad federativa puede consultarse aquí: https://t.co/QVAnydCEDB. https://t.co/ZfTFhfe5K0

item.title: #es @ 1444789272813391876
item.description: #COVID19mx Ya se volvió costumbre diaria de la @SSalud_mx reportar en su informe técnico diario un par de defunciones menos que las que aparecen en sus propios datos abiertos: hoy se acumulan 278,803 muertes confirmadas, y no 278,801 c.c.p @HLGatell https://t.co/EMKdsLr5V6

item.title: #en @ 1444734099541868552
item.description:

Great that five @UN_SDG Data Officers from @UN teams are participating to inject country-level perspectives on supporting Govts to take data-driven policy decisions & on ensuring open data for accountability #WoldDataForum https://t.co/SqpSbuulo6

item.description: Les décisions de justice en opendata ; un enjeu éthique, technologique et démocratique qui aura fait l'objet de plus de 12 ans de débats. https://t.co/lqbIUhB8Yd

item.title: #en @ 1444726960870068227
item.description:
So cool to hear about @Restor_eco and its open data solution to help restore ecosystems - "like Google Maps for rewilding."
Thanks @EarthshotPrize for highlighting those fantastic solutions on the Beeb just now. Can't wait to hear more next week...
#ClimateAction

item.title: #fi @ 1444724319972646923
item.description: Julkishallinnolla on vielä tekemistä vapaasti saatavilla koneluettavassa muodossa olevan #avoindata’n edistämisessä. Budjettikirjan sisältämästä tiedosta vain osa on saatavilla rakenteisessa muodossa. Tiedot oli kerättävä scraper-ohjelmalla ja siivottava/korjattava käsin. 17/20

item.title: #en @ 1444722432615587844
item.description: I know I'm a few days late for #DEHEMRollCall #DEHEM21, but I'm super excited! I'm a PhD student in Genetics at @jacksonlab and @TuftsGSBS. I have a circulation & nervous system disorder and dyslexia. I'm interested in bioinformatics, open data, and accessibility (in all forms).

item.title: #de @ 1444705299064147974
item.description: 1/4 Wir suchen Magdeburgs Radwege! In einem Open-Data-Projekt versuchen wir, Magdeburgs Radwege zu erfassen. Das Team, das am Projekt arbeitet, braucht jetzt die Unterstützung von Freiwilligen, #magdeburg #radweg #kartierung #fahrradweg #fahrrad #ottostadt #machdeburch @Ottostadt https://t.co/BlEeoFqlfI

item.title: #fi @ 1444702611953815558

item.description:

item.title: #fi @ 1444677912259702796
item.description:
Jollakin lähtee nyt mopo käsistä pahasti. Kun ei ole MITÄÄN #Kansainvälisesti tutkittua #OpenData #OpenScience jolla perustella omia mielipiteitä, on pakko lähteä painostuslinjalle?
Onko tämä enää #Kollegiaalisuus-ohjeiden mukaista toimintaa, @Laakariliitto? Kuka on ongelmissa? https://t.co/FE7Xwyznfz

item.title: #it @ 1444530842202693639
item.description: Ho fatto un FOIA a @InnovazioneGov per capire a che punto è la Piattaforma Digitale Nazionale Dati (PDND). Il Dipartimento ha risposto dando molte informazioni che aiutano a capire come siamo messi. Eccole qui #NOSPOILER #opendata #DigitalTransformation https://t.co/qJmxjagi53

item.title: #en @ 1444526385804939264
item.description:
In order to beat this pandemic, we must be faster than the virus. Surveillance, analysis, modelling, forecasting - all of it has to be produced at warp speed.
YBMK @khairykj and TSDG @dghisham have driven the open data agenda for this reason - it's an all-of-society battle.

item.title: #es @ 1444525040368685060
item.description: @rochiyito @Claudiashein Nuestras autoridades reportan lo que gustan. No hay forma de hacer análisis independientes de lo que reportan porque se han encargado de no hacer públicas bases de datos abiertos que permitan corroborar lo que reportan. Los datos de CDMX no son públicos. Los nacionales, estos⬇️ https://t.co/bxQFuzC6o7

item.title: #es @ 1444482362671312897
item.description: Un sismo de baja magnitud ocurrió a las 7:03 p.m. cercano a Lima, Perú. El sismo fue registrado por 4 sismografos open data (RaspberryShake e WWNW) ubicados en Lima e Imperial. La magnitud del sismo es de 3.1. Percibido en Ñaña y San Juan de Miraflores (SJM). https://t.co/nmbuBfuECf

item.title: #en @ 1444382613423235074
item.description: 1. There’s a ton of #COVID19 #OpenData out there and we want to stitch it into one definitive dataset covering cases, vaccination, hospitalizations and every other relevant metric. To succeed, we will need to design a standardized way to assemble and present COVID-19 data.

item.title: #en @ 1444382608364814348
item.description:
Hey. I’ve been working on #COVID19 #OpenData for a while now, but the time has come to think bigger. Today I’m announcing the launch of a new project: What Happened? COVID-19 in Canada
Let’s build a unified platform for COVID-19 data in Canada. Together.
https://t.co/TEkSpxf99N https://t.co/5N9uvUg6TH

item.title: #en @ 1444337299341328392
item.description:
*And:* in 3 of the 5 (SD 2, 16, 21), the incumbent GOPer won't be on ballot. (Other 2 are SD25 & 39.)
A big shot for Dems to grow their majority here. (Note Dems defend one Trump-district, SD3.)
As always, HUGE thanks to @DKElections for their mat & open data for district info.

item.title: #en @ 1444035659522531332
item.description:
We're excited for #UNWDF2021, starting this Sunday, and you can register for free!
On Wednesday, 11:45am UTC, catch "Citizen-generated data for COVID-19 response: Incorporating open data in micro-planning for vaccine equity"
https://t.co/FXsveQtTF8

item.title: #es @ 1444035648151764996
item.description: Muy preocupante noticia, que esperamos sea revisada. El Obs. Social del @midesuy es parte de la columna vertebral de la estrategia de #DatosAbiertos y fuente de la mayoría de los datos del Catálogo Nacional de @agesic. Significa el abandono de aprox. 1.800 conjuntos de datos. https://t.co/JT978lfLfo

item.title: #es @ 1444030624025747459
item.description: Esto es una malísima noticia. Y un golpe fatal a la estrategia de #DatosAbiertos. Casi 2.000 juegos de datos del catálogo nacional de datos abiertos vienen de ese observatorio. https://t.co/OWZJoxhEuG

item.title: #ca @ 1444025591557201924
item.description: El director general de #DadesObertes, Transparència i Col·laboració destaca la importància de les dades al programa Revolució 4.0 de Catalunya Ràdio. Recupereu aquí l'entrevista: 🔗 https://t.co/ZDnJGobZFq https://t.co/eQJF1xoedb

item.title: #es @ 1444018626667876366
item.description: Conocé cuáles son las recomendaciones elaboradas por @la_geofeminista en la investigación sobre feminismo, ética y datos geoespaciales, divididas por ejes : técnicos, políticos, epistemológicos y comunidades. Podés encontrar todas las recomendaciones acá: https://t.co/7Ax15ZZELy

item.title: #en @ 1444018081550962692

item.title: #en @ 1443968385189044231
item.description:
Thrilled to present w/ @AmelieAGagnon on using geospatial and school administrative and demographic data to analyse COVID-19 response in education @UNDataForum!
We highlight the COVID19 School Dashboard as an application using open data for public good. https://t.co/GKwEuDQM8v https://t.co/QMHnUOdkT9

item.title: #en @ 1443968207518326789
item.description: A decade after the launch of the open data movement, many countries have implemented significant open data programs – but what’s next? Our session at the #UNWDF2021 on October 5 will reflect on the future of #opendata and the key challenges ahead. https://t.co/UDRcA9nNsn https://t.co/2fQUVmwLs2

item.title: #es @ 1443967436403978249
item.description:
Hoy he conseguido un código funcional, tras solventar trabas por la plataforma de acceso, que me baja a diario los datos diarios de ~270 estaciones de AEMET (opendata).
En cuanto pueda, bajaré desde el 2000 y prepararé para sacar climatologías, comprobación efemérides, etc.
👀

item.title: #en @ 1443967191859310603
item.description: #OpenStreetMap contributors in Ireland are beginning to track vacant / abandoned buildings. All freely available as open data for remixing and reuse. https://t.co/caxHOgv8Qx

item.title: #en @ 1443961532484829188
item.description: In 2020, @Code4Africa and @WorldBank designed a series of activities to support national statistical agencies, civic media & civil society organizations, and universities in Cameroon, Nigeria & Senegal, to help them turn #data into actionable information. https://t.co/WoKK80V9Sm

item.title: #it @ 1443957245541244934
item.description: Gentile @MEF_GOV avete pubblicato dati CSV sul #PNRR, bene! CSV è formato aperto ma per veri #opendata bisogna ANCHE associarci licenza APERTA. Suggerimento: lasciate perdere copyright e inserite nota tipo "tutti dati sono resi disponibili secondo i termini di licenza CC-BY 4.0". https://t.co/07b0MpCBeB https://t.co/QsGjVcGAEf

item.title: #en @ 1443956151557701669
item.description:
Just spotted these virtual post-its on the #SODU2021 Miro board.
So, #opendata community (especially from other countries - but #Scotland too) what is your success story? What was the data source? What did it make possible?
Tag your response #SODU2021 please. https://t.co/1phXmDaFJ6
